divs: Sighting Details While working as a security guard I saw what ithought was a shooting star but it only lasted 3 seconds and it was at the same place and same time 5 nights in a row 4:27am it appears east to northeast about 70 degrees above horizon. It appears tobe bright lite that disappears as fast as it shows up.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brook Park
There were no other sightings in Brook Park on or around June 24th 2012
Summary: star like same place same time
